text: Johnson Akuchie (born January 6, 1990 in Lagos, Nigeria) is a Nigerian Association Football Forward currently playing for Flandria of the Primera B Metropolitana in Argentina. ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Association football forwards Category:Flandria footballers
title: Johnson Akuchie
